Name: Gold Headband
Description: A headband in three parts: the first part is a flat rectangular headband with two small side bands that are soldered on at right angles to the headband, to help the wearer to hold it firmly on the head. The second part is a gold circle soldered onto the middle of the headband, and decorated with roundels in the form of papyrus flowers and birds with carnelian beads in the center. The third part is an interior copper band covered with gold sheet.
